You have found Podio Platform Kit, the official Objective-C SDK for Podio Platform. It works with both iOS and Mac OS X.

For help post on Stack Overflow and tag with podio. For bugs create an issue on GitHub.

  • Download
  • GitHub

Debugging & Errors

Error handling in PodioPlatformKit follows the normal Cocoa error handling patterns, which means it uses exceptions for programmatic errors and NSError for runtime errors. For errors that occur during a network requests, the error is provided in the PKCRequestCompletionBlock callback together with the PKCResponse object.

You can inspect the statusCode and body properties of the response object to determine if the error was a client or server side error.
